title: Analyst Sentiment toward Northern Trust Corp Stock

content.text: Analysts have a mixed sentiment towards Northern Trust Corp stock. Some analysts are bullish on the stock, while others are more cautious.
Different analysts have provided various price targets for Northern Trust Corp stock. The range of price targets suggests differing opinions on the future performance of the stock.
Analysts' recommendations for Northern Trust Corp stock also vary. Some analysts recommend buying or holding the stock, while others suggest selling or staying cautious.
Overall, analyst opinions on Northern Trust Corp stock are mixed. The stock has both bullish and cautious sentiment, with varying price targets and recommendations.

news.headline: UPDATE 1-West Virginia treasurer adds four finance firms to ESG blacklist
news.summary: West Virginia added four financial firms on Monday to a list of institutions that may be barred from some state business because the state's treasurer deems they are boycotting the fossil fuel industry.  It was the latest move in a bubbling dispute between Republican officials and Wall Street firms over use of environmental, social and governance (ESG) factors in banking and business.  West Virginia, a major energy-producing state, created the list in 2002, placing five firms on it at the time.

news.headline: West Virginia treasurer adds four finance firms to ESG blacklist
news.summary: NEW YORK (Reuters) -West Virginia added four financial firms on Monday to a list of institutions that may be barred from some state business because the state's treasurer deems they are boycotting the fossil fuel industry.  It was the latest move in a bubbling dispute between Republican officials and Wall Street firms over use of environmental, social and governance (ESG) factors in banking and business.  West Virginia, a major energy-producing state, created the list in 2002, placing five firms on it at the time.

news.headline: Northern Trust Strengthens Atlanta Wealth Management Team
news.summary: ATLANTA, April 08, 2024--Northern Trust has appointed Jordan Kiel as president of the Georgia market responsible for leading an Atlanta-based team in the delivery of holistic advice, superior client service and continued growth in the region.

news.headline: FlexShares Announces Liquidation of an Exchange Traded Fund
news.summary: CHICAGO, April 05, 2024--Northern Trust’s FlexShares Exchange Traded Funds announced the liquidation and termination of the FlexShares ESG & Climate Emerging Markets Core Index Fund (Ticker: FEEM) (the "Fund"). Prior to and through the close of regular trading (the "Close of Trading") on the NYSE Arca, Inc. ("NYSE Arca") on or about April 23, 2024 (the "Closing Date"), the Fund will undertake the process of closing down and liquidating its portfolio.

news.headline: Northern Trust Asset Management Names CIO of Global Fixed Income
news.summary: CHICAGO, April 02, 2024--Northern Trust Asset Management (NTAM), a leading global investment management firm with $1.18 trillion in assets under management as of December 31, 2023, announced today that Christian (Chris) Roth has been hired as Chief Investment Officer of Global Fixed Income.
